channel.title: Carolinas Photography's Podcast
channel.description: Host Yeager Yancey Tedder guides listeners through the latest updates to his photography business named Carolina's Photography, LLC. with announcements to products available to you and a topic related to the photography industry and consumers at large that are discussed every episode plus some tips and tricks for better photos to to top it all off!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Make Carolina's Photography...Your Photography.
channel.itunes:author: Yeager Tedder
channel.itunes:summary: Host Yeager Yancey Tedder guides listeners through the latest updates to his photography business named Carolina's Photography, LLC. with announcements to products available to you and a topic related to the photography industry and consumers at large that are discussed every episode plus some tips and tricks for better photos to to top it all off!

item.title: 2010 Shot Callers Ladies Tee Reveal
item.description: IT’S TAKEN AN EXTRA 7MONTHS TO COMPLETE AND ON OCTOBER 10TH IT WILL BE TIME TO DEBUT THE 2010 SHOT CALLERS LIST. NOW WHEN I MENTION SHOT CALLERS IT’S USUALLY FOLLOWED UP WITH EITHER A WHO,WHAT,WHERE,WHEN,OR WHY. WHICH IS COMPLETELY UNDERSTANDABLE. (WHAT) THE SHOT CALLERS ARE. IS A SHOWCASE OF THE LADIES WHO HAVE CONTRIBUTED TO THE DAY TO DAY GOINGS ON FOR CAROLINA’S PHOTOGRAPHY. FROM BOOKKEEPING TO TRACKING ACCOUNTS TO BEING A CLIENT ALL OF THE LADIES HAVE CONTRIBUTED IN SOME WAY BEFORE AND THIS IS JUST A WAY TO SHOW THAT APPRECIATION AND BECAUSE WE LOVE LIST, WE’RE COUNTING THEM DOWN ALL THE WAY TO NUMBER 1. TO COMMEMORATE THE 2010 SHOT CALLERS WE’RE OFFERING AN ALL-NEW SHOT CALLER TEE AVAILABLE AT YEAGERSHOTS.COM. AND WHILE YOU’RE AT YEAGERSHOTS.COM YOU CAN READ THE PREVIOUS YEARS SHOT CALLERS LIST TO GET UP TO SPEED BEFORE 101010 AND WHY THAT DATE MIGHT MATTER TO YOU. THEY CALL THAT A TEASE IN IN MARKETING! OH AND REMEMBER ALL WAYS CALL YOUR OWN SHOTS!
item.dc:creator: Yeager Tedder

OH AND REMEMBER ALL WAYS CALL YOUR OWN SHOTS!

item.title: Carolina's Photography Podcast Episode 11
item.description: In this edition we chat about the importance and the non importance of a name plus details about our Valentine's Day Giveaway with 103X and Sunny 105.5!
item.dc:creator: Yeager Tedder
item.itunes:summary: In this edition we chat about the importance and the non importance of a name plus details about our Valentine's Day Giveaway with 103X and Sunny 105.5!

item.title: Carolina's Photography Podcast Episode #10
item.description: In this episode of the Carolina's Photography Podcast we get some random thoughts on the year ahead and where it looks like you'll be able to share your photos next!
item.dc:creator: Yeager Tedder
item.itunes:summary: In this episode of the Carolina's Photography Podcast we get some random thoughts on the year ahead and where it looks like you'll be able to share your photos next!

item.title: Carolina's Photography Podcast Episode 9
item.description: In this edition of the Carolina's Photography Podcast host and photographer Yeager Yancey Tedder talks about his personal views on the state of Kodak. Basically what there to like and dis-like about the house the coined the phrase "Kodak Moments". Plus an update on our radio ad campaign that's going on right now!
item.dc:creator: Yeager Tedder
item.itunes:summary: In this edition of the Carolina's Photography Podcast host and photographer Yeager Yancey Tedder talks about his personal views on the state of Kodak. Basically what there to like and dis-like about the house the coined the phrase "Kodak Moments". Plus an update on our radio ad campaign that's going on right now!

item.title: Carolina's Photography Podcast Episode #8
item.description: It's been a long six months but we've returned to exlpain where we've been and where we're going! Learn all about what we mean when we say Carolina's Photography and our various other brands... Carolina's Media and Yeager Shots. Hosted once again by Yeager Tedder.
item.dc:creator: Yeager Tedder
item.itunes:summary: It's been a long six months but we've returned to exlpain where we've been and where we're going! Learn all about what we mean when we say Carolina's Photography and our various other brands... Carolina's Media and Yeager Shots. Hosted once again by Yeager Tedder.

item.title: Carolina's Photography Podcast Episode #7
item.description: The Carolina's Photography Podcast Returns and this time with a simi hot to luke warm debate! Is film or digital the way to go? We discuss. Plus Avairy the free and easier to use "photoshop"?!? And why is this podcast late? All those answers and more, FYI the answers probably lead to more questions... Please leave a question or comment for us here and at carolinasphotography.net as well as my e-mail address tedderyeager@yahoo.com thanks for checking us out we hope to hear from you soon!

item.title: Carolina's Podcast Episode #6
item.description: Talking to us all the way from South Korea is Yeager's Big Sister Marica the face behind the silliolte image on the Carolina's Photography Logo. She discusses life in another and a little bit about photography.
item.dc:creator: Yeager Tedder
item.itunes:summary: Talking to us all the way from South Korea is Yeager's Big Sister Marica the face behind the silliolte image on the Carolina's Photography Logo. She discusses life in another and a little bit about photography.

item.title: Carolina's Podcast Episode 5
item.description: With no pre attachments to any established products or brands we seem to be off to a rip roaring start and we thank you for that. In this episode we tell you what equipment to look for in your local 1 hour photo shops and what to avoid that will leave you with the best possible prints. Plus a web sight that'll help you pick the new digital camera that's right for you right down to what pocket you may need to fit it in. Questions, comments, and suggestions can be sent to our e-mail address teddeyeager@yahoo.com and please leave us a review in the iTunes store.

item.title: Carolina's Photography Podcast #4
item.description: To downsize photos or not to downsize photos-- that is the question and topic this week we try to give some answers on. What else is hidden on the Carolina's Photography DVD? We tell you more about the hidden buttons and easter eggs on our promo DVD which you can see yourself by e-mailing us and requesting one here tedderyeager@yahoo.com. Oh and lets not forget about Animon.com talk which could be the myspace or flicr photo slideshow killer?!? Our website carolinasphotography.net is in beta form it's a lot like a house under construction please bare with us as things are thrown all around the place, it'll soon have a new PayPal option along with other features to bring it into 2009! Questions and Comment please and throw us a ranking in iTunes if you got a second.
